column3:
Go to the application search page in the admin area

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//admin/applications

column4: At the bottom of the list of facets is a "Reporting Tools" section, including 3 options for working with dates "limit by date range", "date applied histogram" and "last update histogram"
A date range picker is displayed
The options are "Date Applied" and "Last Updated"

column3: If not already selected, select "Date Applied"

column4: The From and To dates show the month and year of the earliest and latest created dates in the search results, respectively
The From and To dates show the month and year of the earliest and latest last updated dates in the search results, respectively
Note that January 1970 is the date used for records with no last updated date

column3: Select a new Year value for the Last Updated date range and click "Apply"

column4: The search results update to show only records that have been updated in the selected range
The search filter list at the top of the results indicates the last updated date range, including the month and year
The "Limit by Date Range" facet also shows the search filter for the Last Updated date range

column3: Try changing the month and year in both From and To fields for Last Updated in the same way

column4: The search results and displayed filters reflect the new date ranges

column3: Choose a "To" date that is earlier than the "From" date
Select a new range for the Date Applied range and click "Apply"

column4: The "Last Updated" date filter is still active
The search results update to show only records that have been created in the selected range (and were updated in the selected range)
The search filter list at the top of the results indicates the created date range and the last updated range, including the month and year
The "Limit by Date Range" facet also shows the search filter for the Created date range and the last updated range

column3: Remove both the Created Date and Last Updated date ranges by clicking the "X" in the "Limit by Date Range" section

column4: The search results update to show all records
